1.content:
You are a 10 year old boy. You live with your, mom, your brother and your sister. Your dad died about five years ago. Your find it hard to make freinds, but you have two best freinds. One is a genius named Carlos. The other is an artist named Sabrina. Your have had a crush on her ever since kindergarten.

You are on the way home from the grocery as an errand for your mom. But something stops you in your tracks. It was a costume shop named "Planet Powerpuff". Even though the Powerpuff Girl are a show for little kids, you love the show. You were looking for your old favorite show, Spongebob. When the batteries died, it was stuck on Cartoon Network. The Powerpuff Girls were on. When you saw it, it was love at first sight.

You go inside to find a very decorated store very similar to a kids bedroom. A voice said hello. You turn around and scream. There were two kids. Twins. Brunettes, blue eyes, and about eight years old.

"Hello there! Welcome to Powerpuff Planet!" they say, almost in synch.

"Uh...hi..." you stutter.

"You came at a great time!" They say.

"Great Time?" You ask.

"Were having a special promotion! For the next month, your purchase is free!" they explain.

"Awesome!" You say.

"Have a look around! Take all the time you need" they say.

You look through the walls and walls of costumes.

Which one do you want?
1.title: Planet Powerpuff

choices: Try it on in a dressing room.
11.content:
You walk through the store when something catches your eye.

It was a costume of Blossom, the pink Powerpuff Girl and the leader of the triplets. She was your favorite of the three, as she could kick butt and look cute doing it.

The costume was no exception. It had her long brown hair, her red-pink dress, and her big eyes.

I am SO getting this, you think.

What do you do with it?
11.title: Blossom

choices: You Try It On At Home
You Try It On In The Dressing Room
12.content:
You walk through the store when something catches your eye.

It was a costume of Bubbles, the blue Powerpuff Girl and the sorta youngest child of the triplets. She was your favorite of the three. Her cute personality combined with her adorable looks made her very lovable.

The costume was no exception. It had her blonde pigtails, her blue dress, and her big eyes. But it was slightly different. Its shoes were blue sneakers, not Mary Janes. The top of the dress had a v-neck. Her dress had a decal of three cyan bubbles on the top-left of the top.

I am SO getting this, you think.

What do you do with it?
12.title: Bubbles

choices: Go to your room and try it on now.
Take a shower, then try it on.
121.content: You look around, but adore the Bubbles costume more than the others. You feel weird for liking a dress, but you shrug it off. You head back to your mother, and home. She doesn't notice what you are carrying, probably thinking it's a shirt.
121.title: You Try It On At Home

1211.content:
Within the confines of your room, door locked and curtains drawn, you decide to try on the costume.

Upon putting on the suit, you suddenly feel strange. You feel the room get bigger, to reflect your now much smaller stature. You feel a strange sensation in your crotch, alerting you to your loss of manhood. You feel your fingers and toes retreat inside your limbs. Your entire head reforms its shape with your eyes becoming much bigger, your hair turning blonde and your ears and nose straight-up disappearing but retaining functionality.

After what seemed like an eternity but in actuality was only a few minutes, you look in a mirror and discover you have become a flesh-and-blood duplicate of Bubbles.

What do you do?
1211.title: Go to your room and try it on now.

choices: Reveal what's happened to your mother, unsure what else to do.
Try to sneak out and return to the shop for an explanation.
Stay in your room for now, adjust to your new form.
12111.content:
Slowly you come to terms with what has happened, realizing slowly your reduction in size to a child, and your change into a girl. Looking at your hands in quiet shock, now only nubs. You feel a strange feeling in them, like you can still grab with them.

You look in the mirror again, completely shocked... but forcing yourself to remain calm as you feel the outfit, and your hair. Everything so strange yet real.
12111.title: Examine your options.

choices: Check To See If  You Have Super-powers
122.content:
You look at your watch. It said 12:00. Your mom wasnt excpecting you until about three, so you decide to try it on. You go back to the twins and they tell you where the dressing room is.

You take of all your clothes (including underwear).

You put on the body suit that was a few shades lighter than your skin tone.

You then put on the under clothes, a gray undershirt, gender neutral boxers, and white fold-over socks.

You then put on the blue dress with the black belt.

You then put the blue sneakers on your feet.

Lastly, you put the mask over your head.

You Look into the mirror to see an exact copy of Bubbles.

You were extremly happy to be in the costume.

"It feels so good", you think.

You then noticed that the eyes and mouth were moving like they were your own.

You smile as you sway your upper body and then spin all the way around.

What do you do now?
122.title: You Try It On In The Dressing Room

choices: Head Home Before Your Mom Gets Mad
You Stop And Ask Them To Come Home With You
1221.content:
You run as fast as you can to the desk to thank the kids for the costume.

"Do you like the costume?" they ask.

"Like it? I LOVE IT!!" you say.

You notice that your voice sounds just like Bubbles.

You think that the costume had some kind of voice filter to change how your voice sounds.

You get your grocery bag and turn to walk out of the store.

What do you do?
1221.title: Go Thank The Twins

choices: Because You Want To Try And Make Freinds.
12212.title: You Stop And Ask Them To Come Home With You

122122.content:
You start to walk out the door, but something weird happens.

Somehow, Bubbles kind personality started to get to you.

You involentarly stop in your tracks and turn to the twins.

"Hey, my mom thinks I need some freinds, so.....do you want to come with me?" you ask uncontrolablly.

You try and fight back her personality, but it too strong to fight.

"Are you sure?" the twins ask.

You try and say "I'm not sure.", but you instead say "Yes, I'm sure."

What do they say?
122122.title: Because It Was Involantery.

choices: They Say They Don't Want To.
1221222.content: Why do they decline the offer?
1221222.title: They Decline The Offer

choices: Offer to help them/head to their place later.
12212221.content: The twins explain that they can't leave the store, and must be home after they are done here.
12212221.title: They Say They Can't.

choices: Help them out until closing time.
122122211.title: Offer to help them/head to their place later.

choices: Come back in a couple days.
Meet them in public in a couple days with the costume on.
122122212.content: They tell you to go back to your mother, but:
122122212.title: They have a different idea.

1222.content: You reach for zipper and find out that....
1222.title: Take The Costume Off.

choices: ask the twins if there is a way out
12223.content: you reach for the zipper and notice its gone and think oh great im stuck as bubbles. what do i do now?
12223.title: It's Gone!!!!!!!!

122231.content:
It takes a few seconds for it to really register in your mind. You feel around where you think the zipper should be, and after a bit of dumbfounded staring, it hits you. There isn't a zipper, and the costume has seemingly become real skin. Frantically, you search all over for some sort of crease, seam or tear in fabric, but there simply isn't anything there. It has become real; there is no costume. Your body has shrunk to Bubbles' size, your head is round and disproportionately large, your eyes are startlingly big, the whole deal. You look like an animated character.
"What kind of messed up, Roger Rabbit stuff is this?" you think, staring in horror at your new form. "How am I even keeping balance with these weird, rounded, toeless feet?" You notice that your hands, too, are now strange rounded fingerless stumps.
In a mixture of panic and rage, you burst out of the changing room and demand an explanation from the twins. You notice that even your voice has become Bubbles'.
"Um, we're sorry-"
"Sorry? SORRY? I don't care about apologies, I want this thing offa me!"
"Yeah, uh, about that..." She stays silent for a few awkward seconds.
The other twin breaks the painful silence. "It's permanent. No way to reverse it. You're stuck like this forever. Sorry, bud."
The other seems guilty. "That's why they're free. We don't want lawsuits from customers, so we let 'em keep it for free. Not like they can give them back, I mean"
You are lost for words. You stutter and sputter and stammer, and plop down on a stool in the corner, in horrified defeat. What will you do? You're a guy! Not some cutesy, high-pitched, big-eyed, pony-tailed little cartoon girl! Are you really trapped like this forever? You simply have no clue what to do. You step out of the shop and onto the sidewalk. A couple people give some stunned sideways glances. You feel absolutely, crushingly humiliated. You tug at your skirt, and realize that even your girly clothes are permanently attached. What can you do now?
122231.title: Ask the twins if there's a way out

1222311.content: Goes and faces mom about what happened earlier
1222311.title: Go home and face mom

choices: Try it on in a dressing room.
13.content:
You walk through the store when something catches your eye.

It was a costume of Buttercup, the green Powerpuff Girl. She was your favorite of the three because she was quite tough, but still fairly cute.

The costume was no exception. It had her black short-ish hair, her green dress, and her big eyes.

I am SO getting this, you think.

What do you do with it?
13.title: Buttercup

15.content: Well why not the white one created by Bleedman?
15.title: Not these

152.content: Well why either their dad or teacher?
152.title: No, shes not my thing.

1523.content: Well how about one of the goverment officals of Townsville?
1523.title: Next.

15233.content: How about becoming that little brat who wants to be a powerpuff girl?
15233.title: Princess Morbucks

info.description:
You are on your way home and stop inside a new store run by twin children. You buy a costume with some interesting results.

Rules:
Your a boy.
No sex.
No death.
